FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an ACL.
The undo description command restores the default description of an ACL. The description command configures a description for an ACL. The undo description command restores the default description of an ACL. By default, no description is configured for an ACL.
ParentView: ARP ACL view,Layer 2 ACL view,Basic ACL view,User ACL group view,Advanced ACL view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an ACL.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported. The value must not start with spaces and can be a combination of letters, numbers, and spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-acl4-advance-3100] description This acl is used in 100GE 1/0/1
